thread.title: Somerset outlasts Medina Valley
thread.title_full: Somerset outlasts Medina Valley - San Antonio Express-News

author: Raul Dominguez, Staff Writer
title: Somerset outlasts Medina Valley
text:
Somerset running back Josh Avila was determined to return after suffering severe leg cramps late in a District 29-5A showdown with Medina Valley.
Avila wanted to everything he could to ensure victory. The Bulldogsâ€™ defense felt the same way.
Somerset held on for a 35-28 victory over Medina Valley, coming up with a defensive stop on fourth-and-inches inside its own 10-yard line with 34 seconds remaining Friday night.
The teams traded three touchdowns in the final quarter, but Somerset (6-1, 4-0) had two critical stops in the fourth to remain atop 29-5A over Medina Valley (4-3, 3-1).
For more, visit ExpressNews.com
